feed.title: YVR Deals :: Vancouver Flight Deals and All Inclusive Specials

entry.title: Last Minute 1 Week All Inclusive Deal: Vancouver to the 4* Royal Decameron in Los Cabos, Mexico - $689 CAD including taxes
entry.content:
Air Canada Vacations has dropped the price of a 1 week all inclusive package (including flights, hotel, all meals, all drinks, and transfers) from Vancouver to the 4* Royal Decameron in Los Cabos, Mexico down to $689 CAD (per person) including taxes.

The Royal Decameron Los Cabos has 4 circles on TripAdvisor with 45% of reviews rating it as Excellent.

NOTE: The Royal Decameron Los Cabos is an adults only (18+) resort.

The flights from Vancouver to San Jose del Cabo are with Air Canada and are non-stop both ways.

Update 3/29 @ 10:30 AM PST - This deal has sold out.

Update 4/4 @ 9:00 AM PST - April 11 to April 18 has dropped to $736/person.


Availability for travel

April 2019

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Expedia

2. Click on the 'All Inclusive Vacations' tab

3. Try searching for...

Leaving from: Vancouver

Going to: Mexico - Los Cabos

Departing:

April 1 -- sold out
April 11 -- currently available for $736/person

For: 7 days

screenshots from Expedia

entry.title: 1 Week All Inclusive Deal: Vancouver to the 4* Emporio in Ixtapa, Mexico - $673 CAD / person including taxes
entry.content:
Air Canada Vacations has dropped the price of a 1 week all inclusive package (including flights, hotel, meals, drinks, transfers) from Vancouver to the Emporio Ixtapa in Ixtapa, Mexico down to $673 CAD (per person) including taxes.

The Emporio Ixtapa has 4.5 circles on TripAdvisor with 60% of reviews rating it as Excellent. Most places rate it as a 4*.

The flights from Vancouver to Ixtapa are with Air Canada and are non-stop both ways.

Flights to Ixtapa/Zihuatanejo (ZIH) are always pretty expensive, and non-stop flights alone would usually cost about the same price as this package.

NOTE: The packages at the Emporio are what are known as 'almost all inclusive'. The difference between an 'almost all inclusive' and a regular 'all inclusive' are:

- you don't get the top shelf hard alcohol unless you pay for it
- domestic beer only
- unlimited alcohol may only be during certain hours (11 AM - 11 PM at Emporio)
- dinner is buffet style, instead of a la carte

For more info on the 'almost all inclusive' plan you can check out the Air Canada Vacations website. (They call it 'semi all inclusive')

Availability for travel

April 2019

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Expedia

2. Click on the 'All Inclusive Vacations' tab

3. Try searching for...

Leaving from: Vancouver

Going to: Mexico - Ixtapa

Departing: April 6

For: 7 days

Travellers: 2 adults

4. Click 'Search'

IMPORTANT: On the next page, you need to be sure to select the 'Almost All Inclusive' plan. To do this, you click on 'More Options', which is a small button located right underneath the listing for Hotel Emporio Ixtapa...



screenshot from Expedia

entry.title: Victoria to Hawaii for under $399 CAD roundtrip
entry.content:
There are currently flights available from Victoria to Hawaii for under $399 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way.

Victoria to Honolulu / Oahu (HNL)
- Westjet is showing flights in September, October, November, and early December for $385 CAD roundtrip.

Victoria to Maui (OGG)
- Delta is showing a few flights in April, May, and June for $353 to $365 CAD roundtrip.

Victoria to Kauai (LIH)
- Delta is showing a few flights in late April for $372 CAD roundtrip.

Victoria to Kona / The Big Island (KOA)
- Delta is showing a few flights in late April and May for $372 CAD roundtrip.

How to find and book this deal

1. Try one of the following Google Flights searches:

Google Flights: Victoria to Honolulu, Hawaii (HNL)
All Airlines - Westjet only - Air Canada only

Google Flights: Victoria to Maui / Kahului, Hawaii (OGG)
All Airlines - Westjet only - Air Canada only

Google Flights: Victoria to Kauai / Lihue, Hawaii (LIH)
All Airlines - Westjet only

Google Flights: Victoria to Kona (The Big Island), Hawaii (KOA)
All Airlines - Westjet only



2. On Google Flights, click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and browse for cheap date combinations.

3. If the flight is with Westjet or Air Canada, you may be able to reduce the price further, if they have a promo code out.

Current Westjet promo code for Hawaii: none available



Current Air Canada promo code for Hawaii: none available



screenshot from the Westjet website

entry.title: Seattle to New Orleans, San Antonio, or Pittsburgh - $167 to $181 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
United Airlines and American Airlines have dropped the price of their flights from Seattle to New Orleans, San Antonio, and Pittsburgh down to between $167 and $181 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way.

Availability for travel

April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December 2018

January, February 2019

(varies by destination)

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with a Google Flights search:

Google Flights: Seattle to New Orleans, Louisiana

Google Flights: Seattle to San Antonio, Texas

Google Flights: Seattle to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania


- click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and browse for cheap date combinations

- look for the dates that are $168 to $181 roundtrip

2. If you can't book them through Google Flights, you can go to Kayak or Flighthub

- Search for a flight from Seattle (SEA) to one of the destinations listed above.

- Use the same dates you found on Google Flights.

screenshot from Flighthub



screenshot from Kayak

entry.title: Vancouver to New York City - $275 CAD roundtrip | many dates throughout 2019
entry.content:
WestJet has dropped the price of their flights from Vancouver to New York City down to $275 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way, in Toronto, for 2-3 hours.

The flights are in and out of New York's LaGuardia airport (LGA).

There are a large number of dates available throughout 2019 and into the first few months of 2020.

Availability for travel

May, June, July, August, September, October, November, first half of December 2019

January, February 2020

How to find and book this deal

1. Try the following Google Flights search:

Google Flights: Vancouver to New York City (LGA)

- click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and browse for cheap date combinations

- look for the dates that are $284 roundtrip

2. Go to FlightHub

3. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to New York City (NYC)

- Use the same dates you found on Google Flights

screenshot from FlightHub

entry.title: Vancouver to Osaka / Kyoto, Japan - $569 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
Japan Airlines has dropped the price of their April flights from Vancouver to Osaka, Japan down to $569 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way, in Tokyo, for 2 hours.

The flights are in and out of Osaka's Itami (ITM) airport.

From Osaka, it's a 26 minute train ride ($17) to the beautiful city of Kyoto if you use the special rapid trains on the JR Kyoto Line.

Japan Airlines is a very good airline (5 star rating with Skytrax).

Availability for travel

March, April, May 2019

late December 2019 (single seats only)

January 2020

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Kayak

2. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to Osaka, Japan (OSA)

- Try one of the following date combinations:

Mar 4, 5 to Mar 18, 19

Apr 3 to Apr 10, 11, 16, 17, 18
Apr 8, 9, 10 to Apr 16, 17, 18

Apr 16, 17, 18 to May 1 -- $602
Apr 17 to May 2
Apr 23, 24 to May 2, 7, 8, 13

Dec 30, 31 to Jan 9 -- 1 seat only
Dec 31 to Jan 14, 15, 16

Jan 1 to Jan 9
Jan 7, 8, 9 to Jan 14, 15, 16, 20, 21, 22
Jan 14, 15, 16 to Jan 21, 22, 23, 27

NOTE: When you get to Flighthub (from the Kayak search), make sure the connecting flights to Osaka are from Tokyo's NRT airport...



There are some flights out there involving an airport change to Tokyo's HND airport, and you don't want those.

screenshot from Kayak

entry.title: Vancouver to Huatulco, Mexico - $268 to $340 CAD roundtrip
entry.content:
Interjet has dropped the price of a few of their February 2020 flights from Vancouver to Huatulco, Mexico down to between $268 and $340 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The base price is $268 CAD roundtrip, and includes a personal item and carry-on (max 10 kg).

A checked bag costs $72 CAD roundtrip.

The flights have 1 stop each way, in Mexico City, for 4 hours on the way down, and 5 hours on the way home.

Availability for travel

February 2020

Yes, two thousand and TWENTY.

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Flighthub

2. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to Huatulco, Mexico (HUX)

Try one of the following date combinations:

Feb 6 to Feb 13, 20
Feb 13 to Feb 20


screenshot from Flighthub

entry.title: Vancouver to Havana, Cuba - $258 to $372 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
Interjet has dropped the price of their flights from Vancouver to Havana, Cuba down to between $258 and $372 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way, in Mexico City, for 6 hours on the way down, and 3.5 hours on the way home.

Interjet's lowest prices from Canada to Cuba include 1 piece of checked luggage.

Most flights to Havana are bundled as part of a pre-packaged trip, and those are usually much faster flights (Air Transat has some that are non-stop). But they're also usually quite expensive if you try to book them without a package deal.

If you're looking to visit Havana as an independent tourist (staying in casa particulares for example), these flights could be worth a look.

You can also find 2-in-1 trips that allow you to spend time in both Mexico City *and* Havana, Cuba for a total price of $385 CAD roundtrip (see below).

Availability for travel

October, November, early December 2019

January, February 2020

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Skyscanner or Flighthub

2. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to Havana, Cuba (HAV)

- Try one of the following date combinations:

Oct 13, 14 to Oct 19, 26
Oct 17, 18 to Oct 26 -- $334 CAD
Oct 18 to Nov 1 -- $307, 1 seat (new!)
Oct 20, 21 to Oct 26

Nov 7, 8, to Nov 23, 24 -- $334 CAD
Nov 8 to Nov 22 -- $307 CAD
Nov 29 to Dec 8

[2020]

Jan 10 to Jan 16, 24 -- $378
Jan 16, 17 to Jan 24, 30 -- $338
Jan 23 to Jan 30, Feb 5, 6, 7 -- $338

Feb 7 to Feb 12, 13, 14 -- $258 (new!)
Feb 7 to Feb 19, 20 -- $258 (new!)

dates with 17 hour layovers in Cancun on the way there -- $257 roundtrip

Jan 24 to Jan 30
Jan 24 to Feb 5, 6, 7
Jan 30 to Feb 5, 6, 7
Jan 30 to Feb 12, 13, 14

Feb 6 to Feb 12, 13, 14
Feb 6 to Feb 19, 20


screenshot from Skyscanner



screenshots from Flighthub







You can also find 2-in-1 trips that allow you to spend time in both Mexico City *and* Havana, Cuba for a total price of $385 CAD roundtrip

1. Go to Flighthub

2. Change the search type from 'Roundtrip' to 'Multi City'.

Search for a flight like this one:

Vancouver (YVR) to Mexico City (MEX)
Mexico City (MEX) to Havana, Cuba (HAV)
Havana, Cuba (HAV) to Vancouver (YVR)

- Try one of the following date combinations:

Oct 24 to Oct 27 to Nov 1

screenshot from Flighthub
